nav.searchTabDescription: Switch to search for bus routes
nav.searchContext: Discover bus routes across Tamil Nadu
nav.contributeContext: Help improve our database by sharing route information

image.desc: Share photos of official bus schedules

paste.title: Quick Entry
paste.desc: Copy-paste route info from WhatsApp, Facebook, etc.

addStops.title: Add Stops
addStops.desc: Add intermediate stops to existing routes

reportIssue.title: Report Issue
reportIssue.desc: Report wrong timings or discontinued buses

welcome.title: Welcome, Guest!
welcome.message: No account needed! Start contributing right away.

voice.tip1: Speak clearly and at a normal pace
voice.tip2: Mention: Bus number, from location, to location, and timings
voice.tip3: Example: "Bus 27D from Chennai to Madurai, leaves at 6 AM, arrives at 2 PM"
voice.tip4: You can speak in English, Tamil, or both
voice.tip5: Find a quiet place for better accuracy
voice.speechRecognitionNotSupported: Real-time transcription not supported in this browser. Try Chrome or Edge.

error.notSupported: Your browser does not support audio recording
error.microphoneAccess: Could not access microphone. Please check permissions.
error.noTranscription: No transcription available. Please try recording again.
error.processing: Failed to process recording. Please try again.
error.recognitionFailed: Speech recognition failed. Please try again.

voice.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.

paste.label: Paste route information here:
paste.placeholder:
Paste bus route information here...

Example:
Bus 27D from Chennai to Madurai
Departs 6:00 AM, arrives 2:00 PM
Stops: Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram

warnings.title: Warnings:
warnings.lowConfidence: Low confidence - likely to be rejected by admin. Consider adding more details.

source.label: Where did you get this information? *
source.placeholder: e.g., TNSTC WhatsApp group, Facebook page, official website
source.help: This helps us verify the information

paste.terms: I confirm this information is publicly available, not copyrighted, and accurate to the best of my knowledge

errors.lowConfidence: Extracted information has low confidence. Please add more details.
errors.rateLimit: Too many submissions. Please try again later.
errors.loginRequired: Please login to submit paste contributions

busItem.noStops: This is a direct bus with no intermediate stops

route.busNumberHint: Enter the bus number OR route name below
route.routeNameHint: Enter the route name OR bus number above
route.noStopsDescription: Add intermediate stops with specific timings for better route tracking
route.stopsPlaceholder: e.g., Central Station, City Mall, University
route.simpleStopsHint: Quick entry for stop names only
route.locationWarningDescription: Some locations were not selected from suggestions. You can still submit, but selecting from the autocomplete dropdown ensures better accuracy.

contribution.heroDescription: Help fellow travelers by contributing accurate bus route information. Your local knowledge makes a difference!
contribution.cardSubtitle: Choose your preferred method to contribute
contribution.errorMessage: Failed to submit contribution. Please try again.
contribution.verificationSuccess: Thank you for verifying this route!
contribution.addStopsSuccess: Thank you for adding stops to this route!
contribution.stopsDescription: If you know intermediate stops on this route, you can add them here. This information is optional but very helpful.
contribution.stopNameHint: Name of the bus stop or location
contribution.arrivalTimeHint: When bus arrives at this stop
contribution.addThisStop: Add this stop to the route
contribution.stopTimingNote: Provide at least one time (arrival or departure). Both times help users plan better!

voice.errorMessage: Failed to submit voice contribution. Please try again.

imageUpload.title: Upload Bus Schedule Image
imageUpload.description: Upload a photo of a bus schedule board or timetable. We'll extract the route information automatically.
imageUpload.duplicateError: This image was already uploaded. Please upload a different image.
imageUpload.rateLimitError: Too many uploads. Please wait a moment and try again.

busTracker.title: Help Track Buses
busTracker.selectBusAndStop: Please select a bus and stop first
busTracker.selectStop: Select the stop you boarded at:
busTracker.step2: Choose the stop where you boarded
busTracker.step3: Tap "I'm boarding this bus" when you get on
busTracker.step4: Your location helps others track this bus
busTracker.step5: Tap "I've reached my destination" when you get off
busTracker.privacyNote: Your location is only shared while you're on the bus. Battery usage is optimized.

liveTracker.noBuses: No buses are currently being tracked on this route
liveTracker.enableTracking: Use the tracking feature when boarding a bus to help other travelers!
liveTracker.refreshInfo: Bus locations update automatically every 15 seconds

rewards.title: Your Rewards
rewards.loadError: Could not load your reward points
rewards.noRewards: Start tracking buses to earn rewards!
rewards.howToEarn: Contribute by enabling bus tracking when you board a bus.
rewards.earnDesc1: Earn 5 points each time you report a bus location
rewards.earnDesc2: Get bonus points for accurate locations and complete trips
rewards.earnDesc3: Level up as you earn more points
rewards.earnDesc4: Help others find their buses in real-time
rewards.beginnerDesc: You're just getting started. Keep tracking buses to level up!
rewards.regularDesc: You're becoming a valuable contributor to the bus tracking community.
rewards.frequentDesc: Your tracking data helps many people plan their journeys better.
rewards.expertDesc: You're one of our top contributors. Thank you for your dedication!
rewards.masterDesc: Legendary status! Your contributions have helped countless travelers.
